doc.title: Agamista
doc.plot: Ez (Khaled Abol Naga) has a complex regarding Drugs and violence after he almost kills a guy in a fight while high on hash, His escape trip to his Family deserted retreat in Agami proves to be more than just a trip to clear the mind and start writing his first movie script.. It gradually becomes a life changing experience full of emotions and decisions including his divorcing his wife when she decides to visit! and a whole action packed search for a new found unexpected and uninvited friends (Shagloof) (Sherif Ramzy), Balala (Amr Mamdouh) and others ... its a whole new found life for Ez that includes a tough decision to be violent at least one more time to save his new friends.. to save the new life he found, the new Ez!..
